Control Name: Detects and Corrects Production Errors—Errors in the production process are detected and corrected in a timely manner.

control_attributes.Control: Detects and Corrects Production Errors—Errors in the production process are detected and corrected in a timely manner.
control_attributes.SubCategory: PI1.3 The entity implements policies and procedures over system processing to result in products, services, and reporting to meet the entity’s objectives.
